text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِٱلذِّكۡرِ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَكِتَٰبٌ عَزِيزٞ
translation: (41) Indeed, those who disbelieve in the message [i.e., the Qur’ān][1395] after it has come to them...[1396] And indeed, it is a mighty[1397] Book.
footnotes:
[1395]- i.e., reject it or prefer deviant interpretation.
[1396]- The conclusion is understood to be "...will have earned an indescribable punishment."
[1397]- Inimitable, resistant to attack, protected by Allāh.
